participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the silver lining in any situation.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and has always been passionate about helping others.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith

participant_2.background: Michael is a city dweller who enjoys exploring new cultures and meeting new people.
